us.zoom.sdk

Interface InMeetingServiceListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    us.zoom.androidlib.util.IListener

    public interface InMeetingServiceListener
extends us.zoom.androidlib.util.IListener
    Zoom in-meeting service listener.

    • Method Detail

      • onMeetingNeedPasswordOrDisplayName

        void onMeetingNeedPasswordOrDisplayName(boolean needPassword,
                                        boolean needDisplayName,
                                        InMeetingEventHandler handler)
        Sink the event of meeting need password or display name.
        Parameters:
        needPassword - if need password or not
        needDisplayName - if need display name or not
        handler - call method InMeetingEventHandler.setMeetingNamePassword(String, String) }in this object to set password or name.

      • onWebinarNeedRegister

        void onWebinarNeedRegister()
        Invoked when joined one webinar that need manual approval.

      • onJoinWebinarNeedUserNameAndEmail

        void onJoinWebinarNeedUserNameAndEmail(InMeetingEventHandler handler)
        Invoked when joined one webinar that need username and email.
        Parameters:
        handler - Use InMeetingEventHandler.setRegisterWebinarInfo(String, String, boolean) to set information or leave meeting.

      • onMeetingNeedColseOtherMeeting

        void onMeetingNeedColseOtherMeeting(InMeetingEventHandler handler)
        Sink the event of meeting need colse other meeting. A meeting is running on server, you need close the meeting to start a new one
        Parameters:
        handler - Use InMeetingEventHandler.endOtherMeeting() to end the meeting

        Sink the event of meeting start/join failed
        Parameters:

        internalErrorCode - internal Error Code
